title: Blog-Based Reflective Peer Learning Design in Online Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level basic science knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Learners are practicing science professionals aiming to strengthen problem-solving skills through collaborative reflection with peers based on practical experience; digital devices (laptops/tablets) are provided, along with online collaboration platforms and blog tools for project execution.

learning_goals: Learners can perform reflective blog-based writing at least twice weekly to solve practical problems in science.
Learners can provide constructive feedback on peersâ€™ blog posts at least once, deepening their understanding of the learning content.
Learners can systematically organize their thinking and professional development process using the ICE Model (Idea-Connection-Extension).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
